12121.content:
You did as you were told and got in the car with her. An hour later, you finally make it to her home, and as expected she waited for you to open the door. You pulled it open for her and let her in first like a gentleman, but she was not so ladylike about it.
         "Hey girls, finally here," she announced, "and guess who I brought home with me…" That was your cue to go inside, meekly walking through the door and a chorus of "ooohs" filled the air.
         "Well, if it isn't the 'toilet boy'…" one of the girls said walking up to you. She was a senior band trumpeter, a fair-skinned blonde-ponytailed bombshell with baby blue eyes and little over half a head taller than you. After sizing you up she took your chin into her hand to stare deep into your eyes. It only lasted a brief moment, and she turned back to the other girls in the living room. "He's a shithead alright." This caused the other girls to giggle and coo, no doubt thinking up all sorts of ways to torture you.
         "Not gonna lie to you here," Sharon said. "We all have to go pretty bad, but we don't go just anywhere. So I brought you here to satisfy our huge urges. Hope you can handle it; wouldn't want our new 'toilet boy' to choke on us just yet…" The sight of all the senior band girls in the living room staring at you with the dirtiest faces you had ever seen made you reconsider your life choices and wonder whether or not you should stay or just make a run for it…

133.content:

She was really hot, but she was also really intimidating because of her height, and she was constantly making fun of you.

***


And the dreaded gym class begins. "Let's go, loser!" Eliza begins running ahead of you, surprising because she rarely puts forth effort in gym. You keep up her pace but remain a few feet behind, looking at her ass in those tight gym shorts. After what seemed like hours she comes to a stop, completely drenched in sweat because of the heat. "Alright you loser, now it's time for some fun!" You gasp as she takes her shirt off, showing off her black sports bra. "Uh, what're you -" "Shut up loser! You're going to be my slave now!" Eliza grabs your head and shoves it against her sweaty armpit,and uses her arm to hold it there. "Mmm... does that smell good? Haha, I hope so! Sniff it loser!" She grinds your head against her armpit as you inhale deeply, trying to appease her. "Now lick it! Lick it clean!" You're running out of breath but you follow her orders and lick the sweat off her armpit. It tastes bitter and salty but you continue licking.

151.content:
You were walking down the corridor after school. You had forgotten your books in your locker and you were wanting to start on your assignment. You finally reached your locker, which was in the middle of the school. You quickly collected your books and put them into your bag, not wanting to stay too long in the school. You finished and closed your locker door, turning around. You gasped as you nearly ran straight into Taylor. She giggled a little as you backed away slightly.

"Sorry," you said, "I didn't realised you were there." She brushed some hair out of her face, causing you to blush a little. She was a beautiful girl and you had often wished you could date her.

"It's no problem," she said, "My Dad wants me to lock up the school since he had to leave early." You nodded a little, you had forgotten how her father was the headteacher.

"I should be going then," you said, turning to leave. She grabbed your shirt.

"I already locked up," she giggled, smirking, "We're the only ones here."
